articles.author: Victor Goury-Laffont
articles.title: Hawkish Macron refuses to back down on possibility of Western troops in Ukraine - POLITICO Europe
articles.description: The French president refused to set limits on a response to Moscow in a TV interview meant to win over the public to his strategy.
articles.content: Macron responded by arguing that setting any limits on how to respond to Moscows actions meant opting for defeat." The French president spent much of the interview arguing in favor of remaining ambig… [+809 chars]
